get_z_interp¶

cosmerge.utils.get_z_interp(z_max)¶

Generates an interpolation to convert between lookback time and redshift

Parameters
z_maxfloat

maximum redshift for interpolator

Returns
z_interpscipy.interpolate interpolation

one dimension interpolator for redshift
